entry.title: Fwd: Proposal to update BIP-32
entry.summary: On May 8, 2016, Marek Palatinus suggested writing a new BIP that overrides parts of BIP32 to refer to an idea. He also recommended putting a note in BIP32 about a better mechanism available that is unlikely to change things in reality for the secp256k1 curve. Pavol "stick" Rusnak responded that they would write it down to SLIP-0032.
